I know that my small contributions make a huge impact in the lives of many. It's nice to know that you can help change someones life one loan at a time.

lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Davin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: I help design computer networking hardware.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: Even despite our own failing economy, I feel we need to undergird those who are in worse straits. My stepson gave us each a KIVA gift certificate for Christmas this year and it opened my eyes to what can be done globally.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a large mortgage finance company after many years. I currently work in areas that deal more directly with people. Right now, I work in a new museum in Washington, DC

lender.name: darja
lender.loan_because: I am convinced it makes a difference. Kiva.org is a wonderful initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I design digital products and services such as websites, mobile phone applications and similar. I also help companies who need such things understand what is important for their applications or websites to make a positive difference to the people who use them.

lender.name: Leslie

lender.occupational_info: I work for the public defender's office. We provide legal representation for people who cannot afford to pay for a private attorney.

lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the experience of people using certain websites.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: Seems like a good way to help and exciting to see what can be made with microloans.

lender.name: Arne
lender.loan_because: "One person can make a difference and every person should try." (JFK)

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have met so many great people around the world that I trust and know are honest and hardworking

lender.name: Noelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that even small steps can lead to big things

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Ghana. I've seen the poverty and need first hand
lender.occupational_info: I help people that have had a stroke or other sickness that makes it hard for them to talk or eat.. I try to teach them to talk again, or swallow without choking.

lender.name: Jerri
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide people the opportunites that others have given me to be successful.

lender.name: Bruce Bentley
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps and I can.

lender.name: Olav
lender.loan_because: The best way to help is to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: As a student of international development, I'm interested in market-based solutions to poverty. I like the fact that Kiva helps microfinance institutions around the world expand the number of people they can serve.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a graduate student, working toward a Master's Degree in International Relations at The Fletcher School, Tufts University. Prior to becoming a student again, I worked as a Social Worker in the Boston area.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity. Many people in life have given them to me and this is one of the ways I now give them to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop software that enables doctors to improve the quality of care they give their patients.

lender.name: cathy and neal
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to reach individuals all over the world with great ideas and spirit

lender.name: geoffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to see people do well in life,making a better life for themseves and their families brings us closer to a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I build and remodel homes.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to create sustainable economic progress in developing regions. It gives me a global perspective and allows me to be generous with the wealth God has entrusted to me to use for Him.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a student in college, but I hope to soon continue my education in graduate school.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone needs opportunity and a chance at a better life.

lender.name: Kay-Lynn
lender.loan_because: I would like to think others would do the same if I needed a helping hand. I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Northerners
lender.loan_because: We got together and decided we could delay the weekly allowance the parents give the kids by lending it, then getting it back so the money can do some good elsewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Writer of magazine articles and books for children and adults. Two students. A property assessor.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: ... sometimes a little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I assist Dentists in providing patients with dental care.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: My children and I want to help other people when we can.
lender.occupational_info: I write short stories and novels and do research into the basic physics of the foundation of the Solar System and galaxies.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: It was a Christmas gift from a family member. I am fortunate to have been able to do a lot of traveling and have seen the struggles of people first-hand. I am happy to be able to contribute and change things for one of them at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help teach English in Japan. I am not a certified teacher, but a living example of English in the classroom.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: people need help sometimes. so why not give them the help that i can give when its this easy??

lender.name: Sacred Circle & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We support the entrepreneurs with all our heart!

lender.loan_because: I'm able to get a loan, others may not....

lender.name: Lynda

lender.occupational_info: I have recently started up an online classified ads website with a business partner, helping others to buy, sell & save money.

lender.name: Juliette, Molly, and Erin
lender.loan_because:
Molly - because I think everybody deserves to have a good job, a healthy family, and good life and to have fun.
Juliette: because I want to share some good energy with my extended family - whomever they might be!
Erin - because sharing is like Love.
lender.occupational_info:
Juliette - my work and my pleasure is caring for my family. I also have enjoyed being an artist my whole life and sharing my creativity with my teaching and through my artwork.
Molly: I go to school and have big dreams to sculpt and create amazing art!
Erin: I go to school and am a good friend and love my family.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Sadie
lender.occupational_info: I am learning about art. I also work at a University.

lender.name: Laurel & Jack
lender.loan_because: we want others to have the opportunity to be and do all that God wants of them.
lender.occupational_info: We educate senior citizens about how to outlive their money, by making their money grow safely.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are not as fortunate as me

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because: I want to help those with less opportunity than me.

lender.name: Cecily
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy and it helps my team beat team Loewenstern.
